name: Build Up
description:
There’re so many planets in this amazing universe. Thanks to gravity, we can build things on them!

However, the space is limited, can you build up all the buildings on one planet? Tap the screen to drop a building or a tree on a blank area, it will become much intense in the end because you must avoid other buildings!

Congrats, you’ve conquered this planet, let’s move on!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Easy to play but hard to control, you'll find its fun!
* Try to conquer all planets in the universe
* You’ll never know how good you’re at seizing opportunity!
